chunk:
PCA Skin Facial Wash, Oily/Problem

Brand: PCA Skin

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Laurylglucosides Hydroxypropylsulfonate, Gluconolactone, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Sodium Hydroxide, Lactic Acid, PEG-150 Distearate, Sodium Hydroxymethylglycinate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
